CustomField.description:
The field which provides the Merge Rule Priority. If set to a blank value, a Merge Rule Field record should be added with a matching data type and flagged with Is Priority?.
E.g. Merge Rule Field: Address Last Updated, Is Priority?=TRUE.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
The field which provides the Merge Rule Priority. If set to a blank value, a Merge Rule Field record should be added with a matching data type and flagged with Is Priority?.
E.g. Merge Rule Field: Address Last Updated, Is Priority?=TRUE.
CustomField.label: Priority Field
